#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{

char a[101];

gets(a);
int i=0;
while(a[i]!='\0')
{
 if((a[i]=='a')||(a[i]=='e')||(a[i]=='i')||(a[i]=='o')||(a[i]=='u'))
        {
            printf("%c",a[i]);
            i=i+3;
        }
 else{

    cout<<a[i];
    i++;

 }




}


return 0;
}
